bookofrandomtables_treasurehoards.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Treasure Hoards
bookofrandomtables_treasurehoards.description_text: Do you play D&D or Pathfinder? D100 Random Tables for Fantasy Tabletop RPGs. Unleash creativity in your tabletop RPG sessions with this resource for dungeon masters and game masters. Packed with random tables, this book adds depth and detail to your Dungeons and Dragons campaigns. Features include: Common Items: Tables for coinage, equipment, tools, potions, and weapons. Gems and Metals: D100 tables for Cut Precious Gemstones, Semi-Precious Gemstones, and ingots of rare metals. Odd Treasures: Discover unique items like a small alabaster otter sculpture or an enamelware platter with a pastoral scene. Named Treasures: Rare, unique treasures with mechanical effects, plus Priceless Treasures and Sarcophagus Contents tables. Treasure Hoard Names: Legendary hoard names to inspire your campaigns. Treasure Guardians & Curses: Bonus tables to challenge adventurers with dynamic twists. Extensive NPC Tables: 100 Claimants for the treasure. 100 Guides to lead the party. 400 Expedition Sponsors. 400 Rival Hunters. Whether planning or improvising, The Book of Random Tables: Treasure Hoards is your ultimate tool for enriching gameplay and sparking unforgettable adventures.

bookofrandomtables_fantasyspace.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Fantasy Space
bookofrandomtables_fantasyspace.description_text: Cut down GM prep with 25 D100 random tables for fantasy space tabletop role-playing games. Some of the random tables included are Book Titles, Items in a Cargo Hold, Items in a Wizard’s Lab, Tourist Traps, Worlds and Places, Alien Animals, Ways to Space, Rumors, Insectoid Names, Mechanical Being Names, Ooze Names, Ship Names, Space Clown Names, World Names, and even more.

bookofrandomtables_1960s-1970s.description_text: Do you play Vietnam-era tabletop RPGs or other tabletop RPGs set in the 60s or 70s? Cut down your GM prep time with 34 D100 random tables, plus slang and CB lingo. Fill in details on the fly and enhance the setting with tables like Items in a Car, Items in a CIA Safehouse, Items in a Deck, Items in a Restaurant Storage Room, Food, Books, Cars, Movies, Music Artists, Songs, TV Shows, Actors/Entertainers, Athletes, Writers, Names, and Diner Rumors.

bookofrandomtables_eldritch.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Eldritch
bookofrandomtables_eldritch.description_text: Do you play the Call of Cthulhu tabletop role-playing game? 24 D100 Random Tables for TTRPGs. This book is meant to help game masters run eldritch, horror, or mythos-inspired role-playing games. The tables contain weird or strange objects and situations with a hint of the 1920s and 1930s. The random tables are all presented as D100 and can be used in various ways.

bookofrandomtables_fantasyshops.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Fantasy Shops
bookofrandomtables_fantasyshops.description_text: Players will often want to explore cities as much as they want to explore the wilderness. Not only do shops offer goods and services for the player characters, but they can also be a valuable resource in handing out quests or building story hooks. Twenty Shop types with myriads of combinations: Armor, Barber, Books, Bowyer, Brewery, Divination, Fletcher, General Store, Macabre & Oddities, Magic Pets, Medicine, Music, Potions, Robes, Tack, Tailor, Toys & Tinkers, Wands, Weapons, and Writing Supplies. Each shop has naming options plus special and mundane wares. Also, DMs or GMs can assume the shops have a selection of ordinary goods if desired. All are arranged in random tables, so they can be generated quickly. Flesh out stores with Years in Business, Number of Employees, Shop Appearance tables, Person Descriptors tables, Desk and Storeroom tables, Shopkeeper Rumors, and a Secrets table. Never tell your players there are no shops on the street. Use this resource to create a shop on the fly and populate your worlds with interesting items and non-player characters. Good luck and good shopping.

bookofrandomtables_urbanfantasy.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Urban Fantasy
bookofrandomtables_urbanfantasy.description_text: 25 D100 Urban Fantasy Random Tables for Tabletop RPGs. Unleash urban magic in your tabletop RPG sessions with The Book of Random Tables: Urban Fantasy. Perfect for game masters seeking inspiration, this resource is packed with D100 tables designed to add excitement and depth to any modern magic setting. Inside, you’ll find: Unique Locations: Explore Mystic Bookshops and Underground Clubs. Items & Artifacts: Fill rooms with fascinating finds, from a Corporate Vampire Office to an Arcane Professor's Office. 600 NPCs: Ready-made characters with names, occupations, personalities, and secrets. Name Generators: Hundreds of old and mysterious-sounding names, plus 100 book titles combining tech and magic. Dynamic Encounters: Roll for unexpected events in alleyways, rooftop gardens, and a Dragon's Bank. Compatible with any RPG system, this book saves time, inspires creativity, and keeps players guessing. Adventure awaits—don’t keep the shadows waiting.

fantasytowns_50townsandcitiesforfantasyt.human_name: Fantasy Towns: 50 Towns and Cities for Fantasy Tabletop Role-Playing Games
fantasytowns_50townsandcitiesforfantasyt.description_text: Each town comes with a map and three adventures ideas. Plus history, government structure, information about the economy, imports and exports, population, demographics, businesses, and attractions or landmarks.

bookofrandomtables_sciencefiction.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Science Fiction
bookofrandomtables_sciencefiction.description_text: These 26 random tables will help you cut down your GM prep time. Don't waste time creating things your players will never see. The massive illegal drugs table works great with cyberpunk as well. Use these randoms tables to fill in the details, so you as the game master can focus on storytelling. The tables include: Space Encounters, Planetary Exploration Encounters, Rumors from the Spaceport Bar, Spaceship Mechanical Problems, Items in a Desk, Items in a Government Office, Computer Files, Items in a Cargo Hold, Types of Stars, Types of Planets, Illegal Drugs, plus 15 more.

bookofrandomtables_steampunk.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Steampunk
bookofrandomtables_steampunk.description_text: Do you play a Steampunk Tabletop RPG? 29 D100 for Role-Playing Games. Cut down your gamemaster prep time with random tables geared for steampunk RPG settings. Find random tables like Airship Cargo, Artifacts, Drugs and Medicines, Items in a Desk, Items in a Scientist's Lab, Items in a Study, Steam Engine and Boiler Parts, Cavern Locations and Encounters, Non-Combat Encounters, Adventure Hooks and Settings, Names, and more.

bookofrandomtables_cyberpunk.human_name: The Book of Random Tables: Cyberpunk
bookofrandomtables_cyberpunk.description_text: This book helps the gamemasters of cyberpunk tabletop role-playing games cut down their prep time. These random tables add details to campaigns and sessions with a roll of the dice. Find useful tables like Items in a Corporate Fat Cat Office, Items in a Desk, Items in a Hacker's Apartment, Items in a Nightclub Owner's Office, Items in a Street Doc's Office, Nightclub Encounters, Rumors and Odd Jobs, and tons of names for non-player characters.

childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.description_text:
Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: MORE Tabletop RPG Resources by Dicegeeks
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: D&D resources suited for any style
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get The Book of Random Tables, The Book of Random Tables: Superheroes, The Book of Random Tables: Lost Worlds, The Book of Random Tables: Urban Fantasy, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Gather up your party for endless adventure with this bundle of tabletop role-playing books from Dicegeeks. This TTRPG explorer’s kit contains an amazing variety of rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources that enhance your favorite Dungeons & Dragons games—we’ve included standouts like The Book of Random Tables: Festivals and Fairs and The Book of Random Tables: Superheroes. Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together, and help support Children's Miracle Network with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Dicegeeks

basic_data.human_name: Dungeon Master Essentials - Miniatures & Scenery Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Want to spice up your epic campaigns in D&D? Take game night with your friends to the next level with 100+ unique assets within our Dungeon Master Miniatures & Scenery Bundle by Hayland Terrain and Warp Miniatures. Highlighted by downloadable PDFs of new campaigns Bonefields Rulebook and Pirates Of The Dread Sea - Rulebook, this bundle has everything you need for hours and hours of high-caliber D&D play. Plus, your purchase will support Make-A-Wish.
basic_data.description:
Great campaign mods for DMs. Want to spice up your epic campaigns in D&D? Take game night with your friends to the next level with 100+ unique assets within our Dungeon Master Miniatures & Scenery Bundle by Hayland Terrain and Warp Miniatures. Highlighted by downloadable PDFs of new campaigns Bonefields Rulebook and Pirates Of The Dread Sea - Rulebook, this bundle has everything you need for hours and hours of high-caliber D&D play. Plus, your purchase will support Make-A-Wish.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks and software in this bundle is as much as $1,011. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Redeem DRM-Free. All of the software in this bundle are available DRM-Free.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developers and to support Make-A-Wish. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

make_a_wish.description_text:
Donations to support Make-A-Wish are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Make-A-Wish® creates life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses. We seek to bring every eligible child's wish to life because a wish is an integral part of a child's treatment journey. Research shows children who have wishes granted can build the physical and emotional strength they need to fight their illness. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Make-A-Wish is the world’s leading children’s wish-granting organization, serving children in more than 50 countries worldwide. Together, generous donors, supporters, staff and more than 40,000 volunteers, grant a wish every 17 minutes, on average, somewhere in the world. Since 1980, Make-A-Wish has granted nearly 450,000 wishes to children; more than 30,000 last year alone. For more information about Make-A-Wish International, visit worldwish.org and for more information about Make-A-Wish America, visit wish.org.

Donations to support Make-A-Wish are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Make-A-Wish® creates life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses. We seek to bring every eligible child's wish to life because a wish is an integral part of a child's treatment journey. Research shows children who have wishes granted can build the physical and emotional strength they need to fight their illness. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Make-A-Wish is the world’s leading children’s wish-granting organization, serving children in more than 50 countries worldwide. from_bundle.tile_short_name: Dungeon Master Essentials - Miniatures & Scenery Bundle
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Multi-Part Gnoll Kit, Bonefields Rulebook - PDF, Elite Bullywug Warrior Pack, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Want to spice up your epic campaigns in D&D? Take game night with your friends to the next level with 100+ unique assets within our Dungeon Master Miniatures & Scenery Bundle by Hayland Terrain and Warp Miniatures. Highlighted by downloadable PDFs of new campaigns Bonefields Rulebook and Pirates Of The Dread Sea - Rulebook, this bundle has everything you need for hours and hours of high-caliber D&D play. Plus, your purchase will support Make-A-Wish.
from_bundle.author: Publishers

basic_data.human_name: Destiny 2: The Story So Far 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
The Destiny 2 Story So Far 2025 Bundle gives you access to the Light & Darkness Saga. Purchase the right tier for you to complete the chapters you may have missed, or live the adventure to its thrilling end!

*Customers must download the free edition of Destiny 2 on Steam in order to redeem the keys for expansion content.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Do you have the heart of a Guardian?
basic_data.description:
Do you have the heart of a Guardian? The Destiny 2 Story So Far 2025 Bundle gives you access to the Light & Darkness Saga. Purchase the right tier for you to complete the chapters you may have missed, or live the adventure to its thrilling end!
*Customers must download the free edition of Destiny 2 on Steam in order to redeem the keys for expansion content.

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $294. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access Steam keys.

destiny2_forsaken.description_text:
Over 20 Exotic weapons to collect and master. Draw Trinity Ghoul’s bowstring and vanquish waves of enemies with lightning or channel your inner gunslinger and turn opponents to ash with the Exotic Hand Cannon, Ace of Spades. Use your new power to face the challenges that await within the Shattered Throne dungeon and Last Wish raid.

Forsaken Ciphers

Gear up for your adventure by browsing through the Forsaken Pack’s Exotic weapons and instantly unlocking your favorite three using these Ciphers. (Excludes dungeon and raid weapons.)

Shattered Throne

Explore the depths of the Shattered Throne dungeon and locate the source of the Taken invasion. Defeat Vorgeth, the Boundless Hunger, reap rewards like the Wish Ender Exotic Bow, and stand in service of the Light.

Last Wish

Defeat the evil at the heart of the Dreaming City. Are you ready to confront Riven of a Thousand Voices and claim the One Thousand Voices Exotic Fusion Rifle? One of Destiny 2’s pinnacle raid experiences lies before you.

destiny2_thefinalshapeannualpass.human_name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape + Annual Pass
destiny2_thefinalshapeannualpass.description_text:
Pre-purchase now to instantly unlock the new Tessellation Exotic Fusion Rifle, Exotic Ghost Shell, emblem, and emote.

Includes the new campaign, new destination, three new Supers, The Final Shape Dungeon Key, the new and instantly unlocked Tessellation Exotic Fusion Rifle, one Secret Stash delivered during each Episode, an Exotic Sparrow, and all three Episodes in the year of The Final Shape.

Campaign
The Final Shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Traveler, rally the Vanguard, and end the War of Light and Darkness.

New Supers
Defeating the Witness will require untold power. Arc Hunters, Void Titans, and Solar Warlocks; master a new Super within your arsenal and confront oblivion.

New Destination
Adventure through an impossible landscape that bends time and space. Follow the Witness and behold what lies within the Traveler.

destiny2_beyondlight.description_text:
A new power is born out of the ancient Pyramid Ship above Europa's frozen frontier and a dark empire has risen beneath. In Destiny 2: Beyond Light, join your fellow Guardians and bring down the empire at any cost – even if it means wielding the Darkness itself.

A New Destination
In Destiny 2: Beyond Light, Guardians will explore a new destination: Jupiter’s frozen moon of Europa. Brave harsh weather conditions and uncover the secrets that lie deep under the ancient ice.

Wield the Darkness
As a new threat emerges, so too does a mysterious new power – Stasis. Rooted in Darkness, Guardians will wield this new elemental power to dominate the battlefield. Titans, Warlocks, and Hunters each wield Stasis in a different way, with amazing new subclasses to explore.

A New Raid Awaits
Below the frozen tundra of Europa lies the long-dormant Deep Stone Crypt. Unique rewards await those who can triumph in its enigmatic depths.

New Exotic Rewards
A thrilling new chapter in the Destiny 2 universe awaits in Beyond Light, with new quests, challenges, rewards, and more.

destiny2_thefinalshape.callout: Concludes the War of Light and Darkness saga
destiny2_thefinalshape.description_text:
The Standard edition of The Final Shape includes the new story campaign, three new Supers, a new destination, new weapons and armor to collect, and one Episode in the year of The Final Shape*.

Prismatic Subclass
For the first time ever, Prismatic empowers you to combine Arc, Solar, Void, Stasis, and Strand into a custom subclass of your design. Light and Darkness have no quarrel within you, Guardian.

Campaign
The Final Shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Traveler, rally the Vanguard, and end the War of Light and Darkness.

New Supers
Defeating the Witness will require untold power. Arc Hunters, Void Titans, and Solar Warlocks; master a new Super within your arsenal and confront oblivion.

New Destination
Adventure through an impossible landscape that bends time and space. Follow the Witness and behold what lies within the Traveler.

*First-time purchases of this edition will grant access to the Episode that is currently active when logging in for the first time after purchase.

destiny2_thewitchqueen.description_text:
The Definitive Destiny Campaign
Delve into Savathûn’s Throne World to uncover the mystery of how she and her Lucent Hive stole the Light. Learn the secrets to crafting new weapons, the new Glaive, and survive the truth within her web of lies.

New Destination
A twisted wonderland of corruption and splendor, Savathûn’s Throne World plays host to a fragile balance of power. From her palace to the swamp, all that she hides can be found here.

Weapon Crafting
Create custom weaponry with unique mod, shader, and stat combinations. Master the new Glaive weapon type and unleash powerful melee combos, projectile attacks, and a deployable energy shield.

destiny2_bungie30thanniversarypack.description_text:
Celebrate Bungie's 30th Anniversary with a new dungeon, the Gjallarhorn Exotic Rocket Launcher, Thorn armor set, and an arsenal of weapons, gear, and cosmetics inspired by Bungie’s past.

30th Anniversary Pack owners also gain access to additional cosmetic reward chests in the free Dares of Eternity activity.

Grasp of Avarice
Plunder the new three-player dungeon inspired by famed Cosmodrome loot caves of yore. Reveal a tale of riches and regret as you follow an adventurer who traded his humanity for treasure.

Treasure Galore
The Exotic Gjallarhorn returns alongside new weapons, ornament sets, emotes, Sparrows, Ghost Shells, and more. Pack your inventory with rewards that represent 30-years of Bungie, a legendary community, and a birthday party that could only happen starside.

destiny2_lightfall.description_text:
Includes Lightfall, the new raid, and a Season Pass for the currently live season*

Campaign
In a Neptunian city under siege, find strength in your fellow Guardians as the end to all things approaches—the Witness is here. Arm yourself with new rewards and unlock new Dark powers to triumph in Lightfall’s unforgettable Legendary mode.

Strand
Harness Darkness and pluck at the threads of reality with this new subclass. Flow through the city with newfound speed as you grapple from building to building. Every class can tap into this new element, but it's up to you to create the perfect build.

New Destination
Travel to Neptune and discover a neon metropolis unlike any you've explored in Destiny 2. Meet the Cloud Striders, join the fight against the Shadow Legion, and prevent devastation in the technologically advanced secret city of Neomuna.

*First-time purchases of this edition will grant access to the Season that is currently active when logging in for the first time after purchase.

destiny2_shadowkeep.description_text:
As heroes turn their attention to the frontiers of our galaxy, new nightmares have emerged. Join Eris Morn on the Moon, arm yourself with new Exotic gear, and brave the Black Garden and Pit of Heresy. You must confront a sinister evil before it reaches out to cast humanity back into an age of darkness.

HUNT FOR NEW GEAR
Construct weapons out of Nightmare Essence, gather Vex-themed gear, and collect new Exotics from mysterious quests and from the wrongful hands of your enemies.

RAID: GARDEN OF SALVATION
A signal emerges and reaches beyond dimensions, into the uncharted wilds of the Black Garden. One that whispers with temptation, yearning to be solved.

DUNGEON: PIT OF HERESY
Fight your way beneath the Lunar surface and descend into the heart of the Pit of Heresy dungeon. Face hordes of Hive and uncover an ancient evil.

RISE TO NEW HEIGHTS
Raise your power to new heights and explore the darkened corners of the Moon, where Nightmare Hunts will present you with challenges once thought impossible.

bungiefoundation.description_text:
The Bungie Foundation works directly with children’s hospitals through our iPads for Kids Program. We strive to serve as many patients as possible, from those coming in for a routine checkup to those experiencing long stays or difficult procedures. By placing a fully loaded iPad with customizable, age-appropriate entertainment into every appropriate patient room, we aim to providing patients with a relaxing outlet, therapeutic play, and a sense of normalcy that is vital in an otherwise stressful and scary situation. Patients can play their favorite games, watch their favorite movies and shows, read and interact with books and other learning apps, listen to music, and stay connected to their families, friends, and communities online.

Our goal is to expand this program to children’s hospitals across the country in order to reach the greatest number of children in need. Thank you so much for your support.

childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.description_text:
Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

hannahweeksvoiceoverpack.description_text:
Fully voice any character with the Hannah Weeks Voice Over Pack by Ovani Sound. Featuring over 600 professionally recorded voice lines, this pack provides a versatile range of tones and expressions, perfect for giving life to an otherwise silent character! No AI used, 100% Human voice recordings.

Categories Included: Accepting, Confirming, & Thanks – Kind, neutral, and rude variations for affirmation and gratitude. Battle & Support Yells – Intense callouts and combat shouts for action-packed scenes. Commands – Tactical and situational instructions in far and near variations. Declining & Confrontational – Polite refusals to strong dismissals for complex interactions. General Comments – Relatable phrases like “Gross” and “What now” to add personality. Greetings & Farewells – Friendly and dismissive greetings and goodbyes. Puzzling – Lines for exploration and problem-solving scenarios. Wordless Expressions – A large collection of attack grunts, laughs, gasps, sighs, and more.

This pack offers everything you need to create authentic, engaging characters that resonate with players.

44.1kHz/16bit

medievalfantasysoundfxpack_vol4.description_text:
Embark on grand adventures with the Medieval Fantasy Sound FX Pack Vol. 4 by Ovani Sound. This meticulously crafted collection delivers a wealth of high-quality sounds to enrich your fantasy realms. This pack is well-suited for RPGs, strategy games, films, or any medieval-inspired project.

• 59 Armor & Blacksmith Sounds

• 50 RTS Infantry Unit Sounds
Command your troops with equipping, boosting, marching, and fighting cues. Build immersive real-time strategy battles that feel alive.
• 55 RTS Siege Unit Sounds
Deploy war machines and level fortifications with thunderous roars. Upgrades, retreats, and heavy assaults immerse you in large-scale medieval warfare.
• 14 Weapon Sounds
Deflect steel or sharpen blades to a lethal edge. Each clash resonates with the intense danger of fantasy combat.
• 15 Prop Sounds
Flip dusty tomes and snap ancient books shut. Subtle yet crucial effects for magical libraries or lore-filled scenes.

Transport your audience to distant kingdoms and amplify every fierce clash with the Medieval Fantasy Sound FX Pack Vol. 4. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, ensuring an immersive auditory experience fit for a legendary tale.

unitymusicplugin.description_text: Adding music to a game can be overwhelming. Our Unity Music Plugin takes the headache out of the process and frees you to handle the more creative aspects of game development.  You’ll see how you are able to easily trigger changes in song intensity, song selection, and random song play through our easy to use UI. All of this while working with seamless looping capability.  Pair this with one of our specially-made music packs, and you’re set up to make a captivating experience that players can get lost in.

• 47 General Status Effect Sounds Apply flexible add/remove audio, cause/effect signals, and all-purpose stingers. Perfect for universal power-ups, transformations, or custom statuses.
• 26 Mechanical Status Sounds Elevate your robotic or cybernetic gameplay with bot-arming alerts, countdowns, and glitchy malfunctions. These futuristic cues ensure sci-fi flair in any setting.

Level up your feedback systems and ensure every buff, debuff, or special condition is crystal clear with the Player Status Sound FX Pack Vol. 2. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, keeping players instantly aware of their changing state.

• 7 Paper Sounds

Snap twigs and branches. Subtle, organic breaks can add realism or contrast to catastrophic scenes.

• 16 Kitchen Sounds
Topple pots and pans or roll distant utensils across the floor. Household ruin adds a relatable layer of devastation.
• 15 Wall Sounds
Splinter wood, crumble stone, or tear down metal barriers. Capture the raw force of structural collapse in one crushing blow.
• 33 Cardboard Sounds
Tear, cut, and saw through packing material. Cardboard destruction offers a distinctively fibrous rip or crunch.

Bring your scenes crashing down and immerse your audience in rampant mayhem with the Destruction Sound FX Pack Vol. 2. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, fueling an impactful auditory experience loaded with chaos.

A total of 50 music files!

Each track presents three different intensity levels (each ~90 seconds), plus 30-second and 60-second rough cuts, providing five versions per track. With 10 total tracks, you can effortlessly combine these stylistic flavors to suit a wide range of narrative tones and themes.

All tracks loop seamlessly with our Music Integration Plugins, offering versatile control for continuous, genre-spanning soundscapes.

48khz/24bit

roboticbeingssoundfxpack.description_text:
Bring mechanical lifeforms to the forefront with the Robotic Beings Sound FX Pack by Ovani Sound. This meticulously crafted collection covers everything from small droids to hulking mechs, perfect for futuristic worlds, sci-fi shooters, or tech-heavy animations.

With a total of 172 finely tuned sound files, this pack offers a commanding range of robotic audio:

• 60 Movement & Mechanism Sounds
Capture whirring rotations, hulking footstep thuds, clanking foley, and servo adjustments. These noises anchor each robotic step or pivot in realism.
• 60 Robotic Vocalization Sounds
From friendly beeps to glitchy screams, chatter to comedic quips - these synthetic voices lend personality (or menace) to your mechanical beings.
• 50 Mechanical Behavior Sounds
Depict damage, upgrades, shields, and sudden power-offs. Every beep, screech, or metal scrape hints at robotic intent or malfunction.
• BONUS: 2 Movement Loops
Sustain mechanical ambience with looping crawler or transformation effects—ideal for extended scenes of robotics in motion.

Integrate these metallic creatures into your story and immerse audiences in a future of servo-driven machines with the Robotic Beings Sound FX Pack. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, ensuring an authentically robotic auditory experience.

Encounter twisted aliens, living ships, and robotic abominations. Each ghastly shriek or distorted wail immerses you in cosmic nightmares.
• 46 Stingers
Heighten tension with ghostly ship echoes, crackling voids, and unnerving one-shots. These brief but potent cues punctuate every horrific moment.
• 104 Tech & Mech Sounds
Unleash malfunctioning machinery, bizarre glitches, and monstrous mechanical roars. From warped teleports to dire alarms, these effects envelop you in a sci-fi nightmare.

Invoke fear across galaxies and amplify every sinister twist with the Sci-Fi Horror Sound FX Pack Vol. 2. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, plunging you into an immersive, otherworldly terror your audience won’t soon forget.

Fully voice any character with the Bryce Garland Voice Over Pack by Ovani Sound. Featuring over 600 professionally recorded voice lines, this pack provides a versatile range of tones and expressions, perfect for giving life to an otherwise silent character! No AI used, 100% Human voice recordings.

Categories Included: Accepting, Confirming, & Thanks – Kind, neutral, and rude variations for affirmation and gratitude. Battle & Support Yells – Intense callouts and combat shouts for action-packed scenes. Commands – Tactical and situational instructions in far and near variations. Declining & Confrontational – Polite refusals to strong dismissals for complex interactions. General Comments – Relatable phrases like “Gross” and “What now” to add personality. Greetings & Farewells – Friendly and dismissive greetings and goodbyes. Puzzling – Lines for exploration and problem-solving scenarios. Wordless Expressions – A large collection of attack grunts, laughs, gasps, sighs, and more.

This pack offers everything you need to create authentic, engaging characters that resonate with players.

Streamline your interface feedback and enhance user engagement with the UI & Menus Sound FX Pack Vol. 4 by Ovani Sound. Cover back, popup, and toggle actions with a wide array of Foley, glitch, and magic elements. These versatile recordings fill in the gaps of any UI system.

Elevate your project’s interface and guide users seamlessly through menus with the UI & Menus Sound FX Pack Vol. 4. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, ensuring a polished auditory experience for every click, hover, or alert.

childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.description_text:
Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with this mega bundle of 3000+ sounds from Ovani Sound! This massive library features Dark Fantasy Music Pack Vol. 2, Electricity Sound FX Pack, and more! Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support the Children's Miracle Network with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Ovani Sound

Learn the basics and advanced techniques needed to develop original games that are only limited by your imagination. This 20+ library of extremely useful courses includes standouts like Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide, Fundamentals of Game Design, and more. Get the resources you need to start a new career, and help support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: The perfect toolbox for game creation
basic_data.description:
The perfect toolbox for game creation. Let’s start building games—level up your coding skills with our Gaming Programming by Pearson Bundle! Learn the basics and advanced techniques needed to develop original games that are only limited by your imagination. This 20+ library of extremely useful courses includes standouts like Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide, Fundamentals of Game Design, and more. Get the resources you need to start a new career, and help support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $865. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Women Who Code. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

captaincode.human_name: Captain Code: Unleash Your Coding Superpower with Python
captaincode.description_text: Becoming a coder is like learning to draw or play music: a creative journey of building amazing things. Coding isn't just about lines of code; it develops crucial skills like problem-solving, logic, and creativity. Captain Code is your friendly guide to the world of coding with Python. This vibrant book teaches through fun game projects, from simple beginnings to full-fledged arcade games. With colorful visuals, easy-to-follow instructions, and bonus content links, Captain Code makes learning to code an exciting and rewarding adventure. Are you ready to unleash your coding superpower?

advancedgamedesign.description_text: "Advanced Game Design" by Michael Sellers unlocks a new level of game design mastery, fueled by a powerful framework rooted in systems thinking. This deep-dive guide helps you think critically, design strategically, and craft games that truly captivate players, regardless of platform. This meticulously crafted resource empowers you to think like a master game designer, producing exceptional games that stand out and captivate players across all platforms.

multiplayergameprogramming.description_text: Multiplayer Game Programming unlocks the secrets behind crafting captivating online experiences, drawing on the expertise of industry veterans Joshua Glazer and Sanjay Madhav. This code-rich resource equips you with the knowledge and tools to build robust multiplayer architectures, optimize performance, and conquer the challenges of networked gameplay. Whether you're a student or a seasoned game developer, this guide provides the ultimate roadmap to building exceptional networked multiplayer games.

agilegamedevelopment2ande.description_text: Struggling with game development burnout and bloated budgets? Agile Game Development, now with a decade of fresh insights, offers a lifeline for studios drowning in complexity and overtime. Packed with updated chapters and new sections, this definitive guide is your passport to a happier, more productive game development journey. Discover how Agile can benefit every role, from artists to QA, and witness the return of profitability, creativity, and fun to game development. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, Agile Game Development rewrites the rules and empowers you to create exceptional games, while loving the process.

begintocode_buildingappsandgamesintheclo.human_name: Begin to Code: Building apps and games in the Cloud
begintocode_buildingappsandgamesintheclo.description_text: Become a cloud developer and have fun doing it! Rob Miles makes it easy to start creating cloud-based apps and games, even if you've never coded before. You'll learn JavaScript for the cloud, build exciting projects like dynamic websites and multiplayer games, and gain valuable skills like understanding cloud services, security, and how to build reliable, scalable applications. Miles has reinvented the tutorial, making it friendly and engaging with step-by-step exercises and accompanying YouTube videos. This book is perfect for first-time coders, those frustrated with other learning materials, and anyone looking to transition to cloud development.

gameprogrammingincplusplus.description_text: Game Programming in C++ is a practical, hands-on approach to programming 3D video games in C++. Modeled on Sanjay Madhav’s game programming courses at USC, it’s fun, easy, practical, hands-on, and complete. Forget dry theory - dive straight into crafting stunning 2D and 3D graphics, breathing life into your creations with physics, AI, and audio, and mastering the essential math that empowers professional developers. Whether you’re a working developer or a student with prior knowledge of C++ and data structures, Game Programming in C++ will prepare you to solve real problems with C++ in roles throughout the game development lifecycle. You’ll master the language that top studios are hiring for—and that’s a proven route to success.

playersmakingdecisions.description_text: Players Making Decisions dives into the essence of compelling game design, equipping you with the core concepts and tools to craft experiences that spark meaningful player choices. Forget the overwhelming multi-disciplinary demands – this book focuses on the fundamental art of creating games where every decision matters. Whether you're crafting digital worlds or analog board games, Players Making Decisions is your roadmap to creating games that resonate with players, one meaningful decision at a time.

codingwithrobloxluain24hours_theofficial.human_name: Coding with Roblox Lua in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide
codingwithrobloxluain24hours_theofficial.description_text: Want to build amazing games on Roblox? This official beginner's guide is your perfect starting point! Learn through 24 engaging, one-hour lessons, covering everything from the basics to advanced techniques. Build your skills with practical instructions, realistic examples, hands-on workshops, and interactive quizzes. All example projects are available for download, so you can learn by doing and create your own unique games. This is the only official guide, making it the best way to learn and master Roblox game development.

introductiontogamedesignprototypingandde.human_name: Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping, and Development
introductiontogamedesignprototypingandde.description_text: Master the art of game design and development with Unity, the industry's gold standard, with this comprehensive book by Jeremy Gibson Bond. It's packed with practical knowledge and takes you from understanding core game design principles like the Layered Tetrad to building functional prototypes and mastering C# programming. This book is ideal for aspiring game designers and developers seeking hands-on experience with modern techniques and tools, using Unity's powerful platform to bring their game ideas to life.

unitygamedevelopmentin24hourssamsteachyo.human_name: Unity Game Development in 24 Hours, Sams Teach Yourself
unitygamedevelopmentin24hourssamsteachyo.description_text: Master the Unity 2021 game engine in just 24 hours! This beginner-friendly book guides you through the basics and advanced techniques with step-by-step instructions, hands-on examples, and practical projects. Learn how to build stunning worlds, program complex behaviors, design intuitive interfaces, and deploy your games across platforms. This comprehensive guide is your perfect companion to mastering Unity and creating engaging games in just 24 hours!

unrealenginevrcookbook.description_text: Unreal Engine VR Cookbook by renowned VR developer Mitch McCaffrey is your complete guide to conquering the frontier of VR development using Unreal Engine 4. Backed by McCaffrey's YouTube channel success and Epic Games endorsement, this comprehensive guide empowers you to build stunning VR experiences across various platforms, from Oculus Rift to PSVR. McCaffrey's "recipes" offer step-by-step instructions for key VR mechanics, along with clear explanations of underlying principles. Whether crafting action-packed shooters or serene relaxation simulators, you'll gain both immediate results and invaluable "big picture" knowledge applicable to any VR project.

3duserinterfaces2ande.description_text: Mastering 3D user interfaces (UIs) is no longer just about VR! 3D User Interfaces: Theory and Practice, Second Edition dives deep into the full spectrum of 3D UI applications, from mobile AR to robot teleoperation. This groundbreaking guide, penned by four industry pioneers, equips you with the knowledge and skills to design exceptional 3D UIs for any context. Whether you're a game developer, AR enthusiast, or robotics engineer, this book empowers you to craft exceptional 3D UIs that push the boundaries of user experience.

fundamentalsofgamedesign_3rdedition.description_text: The 3rd edition of this classic game design textbook offers a comprehensive and completely updated guide for aspiring game creators. It covers all the fundamentals, from concept development to balancing, with emphasis on mobile and motion-controlled games. Learn how indie developers are innovating and how new business models like free-to-play impact design. This practical resource features firsthand insights into the entire game creation process, from concept to final polish, along with engaging exercises, design tools, and case studies.

introductiontogamesystemdesign.description_text: Game systems designers plan a game's rules and balance, its characters' attributes, most of its data, and how its AI, weapons, and objects work and interact. Introduction to Game Systems Design is the first complete beginner's guide to this crucial discipline. Writing for all aspiring game professionals, even those with absolutely no experience, leading game designer and instructor Dax Gazaway presents a step-by-step, hands-on approach to designing game systems with industry-standard tools. Whether you're a college freshman entering a game design program, an indie developer using Unreal or Unity, a Dungeon Master, or anyone who wants to really understand modern games, this guide will help you get where you want to go.

digitalvisualeffectsandcompositing.description_text: This comprehensive guide by Jon Gress, a seasoned VFX producer, takes you from the basics of compositing and greenscreen keying to advanced techniques like 3D CGI, digital matte painting, and stereoscopic 3D. With companion graphics files and video tutorials, this book is your one-stop shop for mastering the art and science of visual effects and launching your VFX career.

robloxgamedevelopmentin24hours_theoffici.human_name: Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide
robloxgamedevelopmentin24hours_theoffici.description_text: Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours is your fast-track to mastering Roblox game development, even for beginners. This official Roblox guide offers 24 bite-sized lessons covering everything from terrain and lighting to coding mechanics and monetization. Each lesson builds on the previous, making it easy to progress and become a Roblox game development expert. Whether you're a beginner or looking to level up your skills, this is your ultimate guide to building and profiting from your dream Roblox games!

augmentedreality_pearson.description_text: Augmented Reality: Principles and Practice integrates knowledge of multiple disciplines, including computer vision, computer graphics, and human-computer interaction into a single-source reference, equipping you with the knowledge and skills to excel in this rapidly evolving field. This guide is indispensable for anyone interested in AR, including developers, engineers, students, instructors, researchers, and serious hobbyists.

writinginteractivemusicforvideogames.human_name: Writing Interactive Music for Video Games
writinginteractivemusicforvideogames.description_text: Written by the developer of Berklee School of Music’s pioneering game scoring program, this guide covers everything professional composers and music students need to know about composing interactive music for video games, and contains exclusive tools for interactive scoring—tools that were previously available only at Berklee. Packed with real-world examples from small indie games to AAA titles, this guide empowers you to compose music that elevates your games and leaves a lasting impact on players. Whether you're a seasoned composer seeking to refine your craft or a passionate musician embarking on your video game journey, this is the ultimate resource for achieving your musical ambitions.

girlsmakegamesscholarship.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund is a newly formed 501c3 public charity that provides need-based financial scholarships as well as mentorship to girls and young women interested in pursuing video game development summer camps, workshops and undergraduate degree programs.

gamesdesignandplay.description_text: This play-centered guide demystifies the process of crafting captivating game designs. Drawing on 35 years of experience, authors Macklin and Sharp unveil how to translate playful concepts into tangible mechanics and engaging experiences. Through detailed examples and practical exercises, you'll master core elements like actions, goals, and challenges, while exploring diverse playstyles from cooperative to competitive. Whether you're a student, aspiring designer, or seasoned pro, this book empowers you to create games people will truly love to play.

gameprogrammingalgorithmsandtechniques.description_text: "Game Programming Algorithms and Techniques" dives deep into the practical algorithms and techniques powering modern video games, regardless of platform or framework. Tailored for object-oriented programmers, it equips you with tools for building any type of game, from 2D mobile scrollers to 3D tower defense titles. This in-depth resource empowers you to master the algorithms and techniques behind captivating video games, regardless of your chosen platform or framework.

girlsmakegamesscholarship.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund is a newly formed 501c3 public charity that provides need-based financial scholarships as well as mentorship to girls and young women interested in pursuing video game development summer camps, workshops and undergraduate degree programs.

soccerfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
Soccer For Dummies, Third Edition, is a comprehensive guide to the most popular sport in the world. You'll get a beginner's history of soccer, learn the rules of the game, and what each player on the field is expected to do, the tactics they employ, and the skills they need to master.

Soccer For Dummies, Third Edition will give you all the information about the best players and teams in the world, descriptions of various leagues around the globe, and the lowdown on where you can find soccer on television, online, in newspapers, magazines, books, movies, and on TV.

bettingonhorseracingfordummies2ndedition.human_name: Betting on Horse Racing For Dummies, 2nd Edition
bettingonhorseracingfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Ride into the winners circle with Dummies

Betting on Horse Racing For Dummies 2e is the spectators' inside guide to finding their way around the racetrack. This easy-to-understand book teaches readers everything they need to know to play, have fun, and win money in the world of horse racing. Betting on Horse Racing For Dummies 2e is packed with solid information on identifying the racing breeds as well as their strengths and weaknesses, sizing up the jockey, understanding the importance and role of a trainer, placing bets, managing money, and more. For readers who can't make it to the track, coverage will be devoted to wagering online, taking advantage of Off Track Betting sites, apps, and more.

Updates include:

  • Handicapping resources
  • Changes in betting menus
  • Synthetic racing surfaces

formulaoneracingfordummies2ndedition.human_name: Formula One Racing For Dummies, 2nd Edition
formulaoneracingfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Formula One is the pinnacle of motor sports, filled with drama around personalities, team dynamics, strategies, politics, and rivalries that have turned the sport into a global sensation. Formula One Racing For Dummies, Second Edition is a guide to the contemporary F1 scene, written by an industry export, providing an overview of the sport for the uninitiated, and plenty of insider anecdotes for the die-hard enthusiast. 

Whats new:

Updates to reflect current team managers and drivers

Updated information regarding media coverage and where to get the latest F1 info

Revamped chapter covering new formats, rules, and regulations

The anatomy of an F1 car - rewritten to reflect new technical regulations, info about hybrid engines, and Halo/modern safety systems

Updated photos and illustrations

Up-to-date information on points structure, championships, various pit stops, new tracks, night racing, and F1 sponsors

cardgamesfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
YOUR TURN, DUMMIES

Theres more to card games than learning the rules. Card Games For Dummies 3rd Edition will take card game enthusiasts to the next level and explain the tips and tricks that can turn game night into some serious competition. Get the low-down on poker, blackjack, Bridge, and even Go Fish.

INSIDE:

The rules for all your favorite card games Becoming a winner Expanded coverage for online gaming

woodworkingfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
SAND WORDWORKING DOWN TO THE BASICS WITH DUMMIES

Woodworking For Dummies 2nd Edition guides new and amateur woodworkers through the process of creating beautiful works of wooden art. Start with the basics, like what tools will get the job done. Differentiate between the different types of wood. Make plans for a successful project. The craft of woodworking has never been more accessible than with the experts at Dummies guiding woodworkers along the way.

UPDATES:

The most cutting edge tools for the project

Step-by-step explanations

Easy to follow photos and guides

mangafordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Manga For Dummies, Second Edition is a step-by-step guide that shows beginners and aspiring or professional artists how to develop the basic skills of manga figure drawing and how to create manga characters, from rough sketch stage through final renderings. Youll learn about the history of manga, and its various genres, get acquainted with the most influential manga artists, and discover the tools that you need to get started with drawing manga. You will build your skills, using basic drawing exercises, and learn how to draw the essential components of any manga character. Youll learn the key principles of perspective that will allow you to add interest and depth to your drawings, and how to create the illusion of motion, and emotion, by using different types of lines. Youll learn how to create scripts and storyboards, and all of the other key elements that go into a good manga story.

New to this edition:

  • Find out about the latest digital illustration tools
  • Understand how social media can be used as a tool for gaining recognition and displaying your artwork
  • An introduction to Clip Studio Paint
  • Featuring larger illustrations to provide greater clarity

rugbyfordummies4thedition.description_text: Rugby For Dummies Fourth Edition provides readers with a look at how the game is played, offers strategies for winning, and covers every level of the sport, from high school to college, including women's rugby and the international leagues. This new edition addresses changes to the sport's rules, includes new player bios, looks at how the womens game has grown, and how rugby has become more popular throughout North America.

weldingfordummies2ndedition.description_text: Welding For Dummies 2nd Edition is designed to serve the needs of the home do-it-yourself welder, as well as skilled trade workers who weld (from farmers and mechanics to machinists and designers) as well as those attending a trade/technical school who are looking for a course supplement. It explains each major welding method, including oxyfuel, electron beam, laser beam, resistance, electric arch, and forge welding. Welding For Dummies also provides information and tips on the practice and usage of these different welding techniques and outlines the required training for welding certification. Updates include incorporating new welding technologies.

fantasyfootballfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Fantasy Football For Dummies, Second Edition, is a comprehensive guide to understanding how fantasy football works, what the various fantasy league options are, and how to draft and manage your fantasy team. The book is filled with helpful tips and strategizes to help maximize your chances of winning. Youll learn how to be a successful fantasy team owner, manager, and coach, and how to change your roster effectively, week-to-week.

Whats New:

  • Daily Fantasy explained - this is a quick version of fantasy football, dominated by Fan Duel and DraftKings, that involves just one day or one week of games. This model is primarily a paid competition where winnings are funded by other players entrance fees.
  • Mobile apps - how to use the best apps to manage your teams and player check stats, update rosters, and communicate with fantasy leagues while on the go.
  • The flex position and PPR (point per reception) explained, with information on how to draft strategically to take advantage of these options and rules
  • Coverage of NFL rule changes that have taken place since the first edition published, and have had an impact on fantasy football

sportscardcollectingandinvestingfordummi.human_name: Sports Card Collecting & Investing For Dummies
sportscardcollectingandinvestingfordummi.description_text: Sports Card Collecting quality control and how to spot card damage; understanding card grading and grading scales; an overview of the history and eras of sports cards; how to find and safely buy, sell and trade on trusted marketplaces;; how to build your collection, how to price and sell your cards; using data to price your cards correctly; how to spot fake cards; tips for finding great deals online and at card shows; tips for how to navigate card shows; how to flip cards for a profit; how to take care of, display, and store your cards; and how to use social media to connect with other collectors and expand your collecting circle.

casinogamblingfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Double down on your gaming knowledge before you hit the tablesCasinos can be intimidating places for the first-time visitor. Between all the gaming choices, the distractions of lights and sound, and the fear of losing money, it's easy to miss out on a good time trying to beat the odds. Relax -- this book offers insight from a professional gambler who knows the ropes of casino gambling as well as how to explain it all in easy-to-understand terms. Learn the lay of the land in a typical casino then settle in to bust a dealer at blackjack, bluff your way to a pot in poker, or just pick your lucky number at roulette. You'll also find advice on the various video gambling options, including online casinos, as well as sports betting. Be ready to cash in your winnings!

Inside...

  • Getting familiar with a typical casino
  • Understanding the odds (hint - they're usually against you)
  • Knowing casino etiquete before you arrive
  • Drawing winning cards in blackjack and poker
  • Rolling a win in craps or roulette
  • Outwitting video poker and slots 
  • Paying a visit to the sports book
  • Gambling online from the comfort of home

footballfordummiesusaedition7thedition.human_name: Football For Dummies, USA Edition, 7th Edition
footballfordummiesusaedition7thedition.description_text: Football For Dummies, Seventh Edition gives you the working knowledge that you need to follow the game of football and enjoy the game with friends, family, or whomever you watch football with. This book is for everyone who is interested in football and wants to get familiar with the sport, including its history, so they can watch games in person and on television, follow all the action, and enjoy football games to the maximum.

texasholdemfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Don't flop at the poker table! Increase your know-how and increase your chip stack!Royal flush? The river? Big slick? Are these code names for some spy or superhero movie? Nope - they're terms you'll hear thrown around the table when you're playing Texas Hold'em, the most popular poker game at casinos and online sites. Get to know how to use the lingo and draw your way to winning hands with this book. Updated to include expanded information about online poker and improving your mental poker game, it provides insight to game play, winning strategies, and how to take your new skills to the Internet, a friendly game with neighbors, or to the mysterious poker room at the casino.

Inside:

  • Ranking the hands of poker
  • Taking in the basic rules
  • Applying betting strategies
  • Improving your player reads
  • Adding bluffing to your game
  • Finding the online site to fit your skill
  • Braving a poker room
  • Adding meditation to your mental game

bikingfordummies.description_text: With tens of thousands of new cyclists hitting the roads, greenways, and trails, Cycling For Dummies is here to educate and entertain these new riders, and will also be a trusted resource for experienced cyclers. With the rapid growth of e-bikes as both recreation and transportation alternatives, as well as people looking to move from the Peloton to outdoor cycling, Cycling For Dummies will answer all of your questions. E-bike technology is advancing quickly, and there are safety factors to consider, from equipment selection, features and technology, to battery storage and charging, even deciding which class of e-bike should be considered based on how and where it will be used. Cycling For Dummies will walk you through the process and explain your options clearly. Youll also learn about different types of bicycles and how to choose the right one for you; how and where to buy a bike; basic bicycle features and technology; youll learn about necessary cycling gear and equipment; how to set up and use your bike; basic bicycle maintenance and suggested tools; how to ride safely and follow the rules of the road; where to ride and how to find the best trails; and basic training plans to get faster and ride farther.

cricketfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
Cricket For Dummies Third Edition will help you understand the basics of the game, so that you can enjoy watching matches, and even set up a casual game with friends. The book includes clear explanations of the game's laws, step-by-step guides to techniques and tactics, and coverage of the tournaments, leagues around the globe, and great players. 

Cricket For Dummies Third Edition provides a thorough introduction to the sport. This edition is updated to provide more information about Twenty20 cricket, coverage of the womens game, IPL, and Major and Minor League Cricket in the U.S.

coincollectingfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
Coin Collecting For Dummies, 3rd Edition, provides the latest information on: how to get started in coin collecting; how coin grading works; determining coin values, and navigating the growing trend of buying and evaluating coins online. It's the perfect resource for coin collectors of all ages!

Inside:

- Packed with lots of interesting facts, tips, and clear warnings for the beginning collector

- Covers every part of numismatics, including buying, grading, selling, handling, and storing,

- Helps collectors decide which type of coins to collect and how to assemble or diversify a great collection

- Learn how to evaluate coins based on age, condition, rarity, and more

Updates:

- Updated chapter covering coin grading/grading services

- Expanded coverage of the primary role that auction houses play in the coin collecting industry

- Updated photos, illustrations, and content focusing on recently discovered rare coins, and newly-released coins (U.S. Mint)

- Updated chapter covering proper storage and handling of coin collections

pickleballfordummies.description_text:
The game with the funny name was created in the 1960's and is, today, the fastest growing sport in America. We take you through the hows of the game. In true Dummies fashion, the material is easy to understand and appropriate for newbies as well as advanced players. We cover it all from scoring, serving, dinking, places to play, and getting more involved in the community. No need to be intimidated - you've got Dummies on your side of the court to give you all the best tips and tricks from expert authors. If you're in a pickle because you don't know anything about this popular game, Pickleball For Dummies will teach you everything you need to know.

Inside:

  • Learn the rules and stroke fundamentals
  • Intro to the fun, social aspects of the game
  • Advanced strategies that will raise an experienced player to next level
  • Tips for tournament players and club organizers

drawingfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
Drawing For Dummies, Third Edition, provides readers with a fun, easy way to learn the drawing basics and gives them the tools they need to learn the basics and move on to more advanced techniques. Whether you are a beginner, or a more advanced artist, Drawing For Dummies, Third Edition is a helpful, user-friendly resource that meets learners where they are. The author will show readers how to implement a solid, manageable approach to drawing that works no matter what they are drawing. 

This revised edition includes the following updates:

  • A greater focus on intriguing aspects of artmaking that dont require special equipment or abilities. 
  • Readers are introduced to fundamental shifts in attention needed to see the world in a way that is helpful for learning to draw it and are invited to use any materials they have on hand to explore their inner vision and creative responses through drawing exercises.
  • Clearer explanations for more challenging concepts - the author will use new objects to get points across in a simpler way that will make it easier for the reader to understand each step
  • More step-by-step illustrations will be included and key images will be enlarged so that they are easier to read and study

sailingfordummies3rdedition.description_text:
AHOY DUMMIES! Sailing For Dummies 3rd Edition can give any land lubber their sea legs. Learn how to sail the ocean blue, or at least, how to launch the boat. Get started with the sailing basics like tying knots, turning sails, understanding sea conditions, making sense of nautical terms. Whether youre learning to sail for the first time, or youre practically a pirate, this book is the need-to-read reference that will stay at your helm for years to come.

INSIDE:

  • Nautical terms to know
  • How to get where youre going
  • Knots, sails, and other moving parts
  • Choosing the right boat for you

safeinourworld.description_text:
Donations to support Safe in Our World are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The main goal of Safe In Our World is to foster worldwide mental health awareness in the video games industry and wider community. We work with the industry to advocate for better mental health and wellbeing support, helping employers implement policies, training, and resources. We also reach out to gamers to signpost to life-saving resources, raise awareness, and share vital information about mental illness. We strive to eliminate the stigma surrounding mental health, to make it a natural topic of discussion, and to promote the dialogue so people are not afraid to reach out for help if they need it.

skateboardingfordummies.description_text:
Skateboarding is a fun, challenging, and inclusive sport that can also be a powerful outlet for self-expression. Skateboarding For Dummies will teach you about the history and evolution of skateboarding; skateboard etiquette; board basics; how to master the coolest tricks, grabs, and grinds; and how to skate safely and avoid injury.

You will also learn how skateboarding can bring positivity to your life and how it can help your self-esteem, help you build confidence, and teach you how to express yourself through your skating style.

safeinourworld.description_text:
Donations to support Safe in Our World are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The main goal of Safe In Our World is to foster worldwide mental health awareness in the video games industry and wider community. We work with the industry to advocate for better mental health and wellbeing support, helping employers implement policies, training, and resources. We also reach out to gamers to signpost to life-saving resources, raise awareness, and share vital information about mental illness. We strive to eliminate the stigma surrounding mental health, to make it a natural topic of discussion, and to promote the dialogue so people are not afraid to reach out for help if they need it.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Hobbies and Games for Dummies by Wiley
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Read up before hitting the courts
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Biking For Dummies, Pickleball For Dummies, Skateboarding For Dummies, Manga For Dummies, 2nd Edition, Welding For Dummies, 2nd Edition, Woodworking For Dummies, 2nd Edition, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Have you ever wanted to pick up a new hobby? Learn how to play sports and create using your hands with help from our latest For Dummies Bundle. The experts at Wiley can prepare you for anything with ebooks like Manga For Dummies, Pickleball For Dummies, Welding For Dummies, and much more. Impress your friends and stay active alongside them today with our Hobbies and Games for Dummies bundle. Plus, your purchase helps support Safe In Our World.
from_bundle.author: Wiley
